detail_desc: Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Round neckline, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Biker jacket in shimmering metallic imitation leather with decorative shoulder tabs and notch lapels with press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Soft cotton jersey bodysuits in different designs with long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Soft cotton jersey bodysuits in different designs with long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved dress in textured jersey made from a cotton blend. Round neckline with a press-stud at one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a dress in velour made from a cotton blend and a pair of leggings and hairband in patterned cotton jersey. Dress with a press-stud on each shoulder (except in sizes 3-4Y), a gathered seam at the waist for soft draping, sleeves with turn-ups, and heart-shaped pockets on the skirt. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. Hairband with a sewn-in knot at the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Lightly padded jacket in washed cotton denim with a faux shearling collar and soft flannel lining. Buttons down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and button, and buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved tops in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Long-sleeved tops in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Cotton canvas trainers with a padded top edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and textured rubber soles.
Trainers in canvas with a padded top edge and tongue, lacing at the front, and imitation leather heel caps. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and patterned rubber soles.

Patterned swimsuit with a slight sheen, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a lined gusset.
Patterned swimsuit with a slight sheen, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a lined gusset.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft double knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft double knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.

Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip at the top. Short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. The polo shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip at the top. Short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. The polo shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Hat in braided paper straw with ears on top, embroidery and sequins on the front and a floral grosgrain band.
Bomber jacket in glossy, patterned satin with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Raglan sleeves, diagonal front pockets and wide, covered elastication at the hem. Lined.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and narrow hems.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and narrow hems.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. High slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with wide 3/4-length sleeves. No fasteners.
Knee-length shorts in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Knee-length shorts in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, soft jersey on the inside of the chin and a wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, and elastication at the waist and cuffs. Longer at the back with a small vent. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, soft jersey on the inside of the chin and a wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, and elastication at the waist and cuffs. Longer at the back with a small vent. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band.
A pair of long metal earrings with a hoop and rod-shaped pendants. Length 6 cm. Diameter 2.5 cm.

Small nylon bag with reinforced edges, a zipped outer compartment and a narrow shoulder strap with a stylish metal cord stopper. Flap with a hook and loop fastening, a zipped inner compartment and six card compartments, one with a plastic window. Size approx. 12.5x16 cm.

Lined shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a reflective strip on each leg, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shorts in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with covered elastication, a small frill trim and a decorative, sewn-on bow at the waist.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam under the bust and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Tunic in an airy weave with a slight sheen. Wrapover at the top with a deep V-neck and ties at the waist. Gathers at the shoulders, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Knee-length tunic in a viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow ties under the bust and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Knee-length tunic in a viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow ties under the bust and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, buttons at the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed trim around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y).

Lightly padded puffer jacket in a quilted weave. Detachable hood with concealed press-studs and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams and narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.

Lightly padded puffer jacket in a quilted weave. Detachable hood with concealed press-studs and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams and narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in softly draping denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High, frill-trimmed waist with covered elastication, and pockets in the side seams.

High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
